name: ekai-gateway
description: Ekai Gateway - Multi-provider AI request routing with dashboard

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=gateway" "npm run dev --workspace=ui/dashboard" "npm run start --workspace=memory"
scripts.build:cli: cd tools/ekai-cli && npm install && npm run sync:catalog && npm run build
scripts.cli:install: npm run build:cli && node tools/ekai-cli/scripts/set-workspace.js "$PWD" && cd tools/ekai-cli && npm link
scripts.build: npm install --workspaces && npm run build --workspaces --if-present && npm run build:cli
scripts.start: npm install && concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:ui"

author: Ekai Labs
